content.title: SUPPLIER CONTRACT
key_sections: 2. PRICE: £[AMOUNT] per [UNIT]. Prices fixed for [PERIOD]. Increases require [NOTICE] notice.
3. ORDERS: Customer issues POs. Supplier confirms within [DAYS] days.
4. DELIVERY: [DELIVERY_TERMS - FOB/CIF/DDP]. Delivered to [LOCATION] by [TIME]. Late delivery: Customer may terminate and claim damages.
5. INSPECTION: Customer may inspect/test. Rejection within [DAYS] days of delivery.
6. TITLE AND RISK: Risk passes on delivery. Title passes on payment (retention of title).
7. WARRANTY: Goods free from defects, fit for purpose, comply with spec. Services with reasonable skill and care. Warranty period: [PERIOD].
8. REMEDIES: Breach of warranty: repair, replacement, or refund at Customer's option. Supplier bears costs.
9. RECALL: If goods defective/unsafe, Supplier recalls at own cost.
10. LIABILITY: Supplier indemnifies Customer for third-party claims (IP, defects). Liability limited to [£X or insurance limit]. No limit for death/injury, fraud, or IP infringement.
11. INSURANCE: Supplier maintains [product liability insurance £X / professional indemnity £X]. Evidence on request.
12. COMPLIANCE: Supplier complies with all laws including Health & Safety, Environmental, Data Protection, Modern Slavery Act, Bribery Act.
14. TERMINATION: [NOTICE] notice or immediate for breach/insolvency.
15. MODERN SLAVERY: Supplier warrants compliance with Modern Slavery Act 2015. Annual statement if turnover >£36m.
16. SUSTAINABILITY: [If applicable: Supplier meets sustainability standards in Schedule 2.]
content.compliance_notes: Modern Slavery Act 2015: Suppliers with turnover £36m+ must publish annual slavery and human trafficking statement.
